channel.title: Analog(ue)
channel.description: So many podcasts are about our digital devices. Analog(ue) is a show about how these devices make us feel and how they change our lives for the better, but also for the worse. Hosted by Myke Hurley and Casey Liss.

item.title: Analog(ue) 162: Extremely Worthwhile Waste of Time
item.description: Myke inspires the youth and sails a boat. Casey is rethinking some social media usage and ponders the future of his app.
item.content:encoded:
Myke inspires the youth and sails a boat. Casey is rethinking some social media usage and ponders the future of his app.

This episode of Analog(ue) is sponsored by:

item.title: Analog(ue) 161: Perfect Storm of Stuff
item.description: More unexpected vacations, plans for celebrations, and apps we cannot live without.
item.content:encoded:
More unexpected vacations, plans for celebrations, and apps we cannot live without.
